trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Allentown
There were no other sightings in Allentown on or around April 16th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswaling towards the car and noticed a reflective flash above the row homes where we were parked, looked up and I said to my brother "look look look!" he noticed the last flash as he rounded the corner. We stayed there for another half hour or so looking up but saw nothing more.
